data.textUthmani: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ أَنَّكَ تَرَى ٱلْأَرْضَ خَـٰشِعَةً فَإِذَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَيْهَا ٱلْمَآءَ ٱهْتَزَّتْ وَرَبَتْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَحْيَاهَا لَمُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: وَمِنْ [And among] ءَايَـٰتِهِۦٓ [His Signs] أَنَّكَ [(is) that you] تَرَى [see] ٱلْأَرْضَ [the earth] خَـٰشِعَةًۭ [barren] فَإِذَآ [but when] أَنزَلْنَا [We send down] عَلَيْهَا [upon it] ٱلْمَآءَ [water] ٱهْتَزَّتْ [it is stirred (to life)] وَرَبَتْ ۚ [and grows] إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِىٓ [the One Who] أَحْيَاهَا [gives it life] لَمُحْىِ [(is) surely the Giver of life] ٱلْمَوْتَىٰٓ ۚ [(to) the dead] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] عَلَىٰ [(is) on] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] قَدِيرٌ [All-Powerful]
data.transliteration: Wamin ayatihi annaka taraal-arda khashiAAatan fa-itha anzalnaAAalayha almaa ihtazzat warabat inna allatheeahyaha lamuhyee almawta innahuAAala kulli shay-in qadeer

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُلْحِدُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا لَا يَخْفَوْنَ عَلَيْنَآ ۗ أَفَمَن يُلْقَىٰ فِى ٱلنَّارِ خَيْرٌ أَم مَّن يَأْتِىٓ ءَامِنًا يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ مَا شِئْتُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] يُلْحِدُونَ [distort] فِىٓ [[in]] ءَايَـٰتِنَا [Our Verses] لَا [(are) not] يَخْفَوْنَ [hidden] عَلَيْنَآ ۗ [from Us] أَفَمَن [So, is (he) who] يُلْقَىٰ [is cast] فِى [in] ٱلنَّارِ [the Fire] خَيْرٌ [better] أَم [or] مَّن [(he) who] يَأْتِىٓ [comes] ءَامِنًۭا [secure] يَوْمَ [(on the) Day] ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۚ [(of) Resurrection] ٱعْمَلُوا۟ [Do] مَا [what] شِئْتُمْ ۖ [you will] إِنَّهُۥ [Indeed, He] بِمَا [of what] تَعْمَلُونَ [you do] بَصِيرٌ [(is) All-Seer]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena yulhidoona feeayatina la yakhfawna AAalaynaafaman yulqa fee annari khayrun ammanya/tee aminan yawma alqiyamati iAAmaloo mashi/tum innahu bima taAAmaloona baseer

data.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ بِٱلذِّكْرِ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ ۖ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَكِتَـٰبٌ عَزِيزٌ
data.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] كَفَرُوا۟ [disbelieve] بِٱلذِّكْرِ [in the Reminder] لَمَّا [when] جَآءَهُمْ ۖ [it comes to them] وَإِنَّهُۥ [And indeed, it] لَكِتَـٰبٌ [(is) surely a Book] عَزِيزٌۭ [mighty]
data.transliteration: Inna allatheena kafaroo biththikrilamma jaahum wa-innahu lakitabun AAazeez

data.textUthmani: لَّا يَأْتِيهِ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ مِنۢ بَيْنِ يَدَيْهِ وَلَا مِنْ خَلْفِهِۦ ۖ تَنزِيلٌ مِّنْ حَكِيمٍ حَمِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: لَّا [Not] يَأْتِيهِ [comes to it] ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ [the falsehood] مِنۢ [from] بَيْنِ [before it] يَدَيْهِ [before it] وَلَا [and not] مِنْ [from] خَلْفِهِۦ ۖ [behind it] تَنزِيلٌۭ [A Revelation] مِّنْ [from] حَكِيمٍ [(the) All-Wise] حَمِيدٍۢ [(the) Praiseworthy]
data.transliteration: La ya/teehi albatilu min bayniyadayhi wala min khalfihi tanzeelun min hakeemin hameed

data.textUthmani: مَّا يُقَالُ لَكَ إِلَّا مَا قَدْ قِيلَ لِلرُّسُلِ مِن قَبْلِكَ ۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو مَغْفِرَةٍ وَذُو عِقَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
data.wordByWord: مَّا [Not] يُقَالُ [is said] لَكَ [to you] إِلَّا [except] مَا [what] قَدْ [was said] قِيلَ [was said] لِلرُّسُلِ [to the Messengers] مِن [before you] قَبْلِكَ ۚ [before you] إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] لَذُو [(is) Possessor] مَغْفِرَةٍۢ [(of) forgiveness] وَذُو [and Possessor] عِقَابٍ [(of) penalty] أَلِيمٍۢ [painful]
data.transliteration: Ma yuqalu laka illa maqad qeela lirrusuli min qablika inna rabbaka lathoomaghfiratin wathoo AAiqabin aleem

data.textUthmani: وَلَوْ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ قُرْءَانًا أَعْجَمِيًّا لَّقَالُوا۟ لَوْلَا فُصِّلَتْ ءَايَـٰتُهُۥٓ ۖ ءَا۬عْجَمِىٌّ وَعَرَبِىٌّ ۗ قُلْ هُوَ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ هُدًى وَشِفَآءٌ ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِمْ وَقْرٌ وَهُوَ عَلَيْهِمْ عَمًى ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ يُنَادَوْنَ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
data.wordByWord: وَلَوْ [And if] جَعَلْنَـٰهُ [We (had) made it] قُرْءَانًا [a Quran] أَعْجَمِيًّۭا [(in) a foreign (language)] لَّقَالُوا۟ [they (would have) said] لَوْلَا [Why not] فُصِّلَتْ [are explained in detail] ءَايَـٰتُهُۥٓ ۖ [its verses] ءَا۬عْجَمِىٌّۭ [(Is it) a foreign (language)] وَعَرَبِىٌّۭ ۗ [and an Arab] قُلْ [Say] هُوَ [It (is)] لِلَّذِينَ [for those who] ءَامَنُوا۟ [believe] هُدًۭى [a guidance] وَشِفَآءٌۭ ۖ [and a healing] وَٱلَّذِينَ [And those who] لَا [(do) not] يُؤْمِنُونَ [believe] فِىٓ [in] ءَاذَانِهِمْ [their ears] وَقْرٌۭ [(is) deafness] وَهُوَ [and it] عَلَيْهِمْ [(is) for them] عَمًى ۚ [blindness] أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ [Those] يُنَادَوْنَ [are being called] مِن [from] مَّكَانٍۭ [a place] بَعِيدٍۢ [far]
data.transliteration: Walaw jaAAalnahu qur-ananaAAjamiyyan laqaloo lawla fussilat ayatuhuaaAAjamiyyun waAAarabiyyun qul huwa lillatheena amanoohudan washifaon wallatheena layu/minoona fee athanihim waqrun wahuwa AAalayhim AAaman ola-ikayunadawna min makanin baAAeed

data.textUthmani: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ فَٱخْتُلِفَ فِيهِ ۗ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَفِى شَكٍّ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍ
data.wordByWord: وَلَقَدْ [And certainly] ءَاتَيْنَا [We gave] مُوسَى [Musa] ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ [the Book] فَٱخْتُلِفَ [but disputes arose] فِيهِ ۗ [therein] وَلَوْلَا [And had it not been] كَلِمَةٌۭ [(for) a word] سَبَقَتْ [(that) preceded] مِن [from] رَّبِّكَ [your Lord] لَقُضِىَ [surely, would have been settled] بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ [between them] وَإِنَّهُمْ [But indeed, they] لَفِى [surely (are) in] شَكٍّۢ [doubt] مِّنْهُ [about it] مُرِيبٍۢ [disquieting]
data.transliteration: Walaqad atayna moosaalkitaba fakhtulifa feehi walawla kalimatunsabaqat min rabbika laqudiya baynahum wa-innahum lafeeshakkin minhu mureeb

data.textUthmani: مَّنْ عَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ وَمَنْ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيْهَا ۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّـٰمٍ لِّلْعَبِيدِ
data.wordByWord: مَّنْ [Whoever] عَمِلَ [does] صَـٰلِحًۭا [righteous deeds] فَلِنَفْسِهِۦ ۖ [then it is for his soul] وَمَنْ [and whoever] أَسَآءَ [does evil] فَعَلَيْهَا ۗ [then it is against it] وَمَا [And not] رَبُّكَ [(is) your Lord] بِظَلَّـٰمٍۢ [unjust] لِّلْعَبِيدِ [to His slaves]
data.transliteration: Man AAamila salihanfalinafsihi waman asaa faAAalayha wamarabbuka bithallamin lilAAabeed

words.translation: then it is for his soul
